about_the_game:
Step into the whimsical and competitive world of MiniGolf Showdown, where classic mini-golf meets creative course design across a variety of immersive and dynamic worlds. Perfect your shots, tackle unique challenges, and uncover surprises as you journey through expertly crafted levels inspired by breathtaking themes such as Ancient Roman Empires, Cloudy Balloon Parks, and Icy Caverns. Whether you're a casual player or a hardcore mini-golf enthusiast, this game offers a thrilling experience for everyone.

Why Play MiniGolf Showdown?

MiniGolf Showdown isn’t just a mini-golf game—it’s an adventure. With a mix of creativity, challenge, and variety, each hole feels like a puzzle waiting to be solved. Whether you're navigating through lava mazes , soaring through balloon-filled skies, or bouncing across icy paths, every moment is packed with fun and surprises.

Wishlist Now!

Don't miss your chance to experience the ultimate mini-golf adventure. Add MiniGolf Showdown to your wishlist and be the first to play on launch day!

name: MiniGolf Showdown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/10
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support

short_description: Dive into the ultimate mini-golf competition where precision meets creativity, featuring challenging courses, dynamic mechanics, multiplayer action, and unlockable customizations across a variety of vibrant, themed worlds.
